/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the tranquil atmosphere of the city. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy that filters the sunlight, casting dappled shadows on the path below. The sky above is a clear blue, adding to the overall calmness of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue sky.
